alert.note: Alert for Arthur (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 6:21PM CDT until June 24 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Arthur County in west central Nebraska... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 521 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Arthur, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Arthur, Haythorn Lake, Bucktail Lake, Lena, Three Mile Lake, Bucktail and Calora. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 115 and 130. Highway 92 between mile markers 165 and 178. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
